channel.title: Security on The Hidden Port
channel.description: Recent content in Security on The Hidden Port

item.title: Getting Started with Amazon GuardDuty: Setup, Findings, and SIEM Integration
item.description: Learn how to enable Amazon GuardDuty, understand its security findings, and integrate with SIEM solutions for enhanced threat detection in AWS.

item.title: Detecting Privilege Escalation in AWS Using CloudTrail and EventBridge
item.description: Learn how to detect IAM privilege escalation attempts in AWS using CloudTrail logs, EventBridge rules, and practical detection engineering strategies. Includes examples, alerting techniques, and real-world API call patterns.

item.title: Building a Hardened Amazon Linux 2 AMI for Secure EC2 Deployments
item.description: Learn how to create a hardened, compliant Amazon Linux 2 AMI using EC2 Image Builder with CIS benchmarks, security tools, and automation for production-ready AWS environments.

item.title: Enforcing Least Privilege in AWS IAM with Access Analyzer and Last Access Data
item.description: A practical guide on enforcing least privilege in AWS IAM by using IAM Access Analyzer and service Last Accessed data. Includes real workflows, auditing strategies, and automation tips.

item.title: Securing EC2 Access with AWS Systems Manager Session Manager: Eliminating SSH
item.description: A comprehensive guide to replacing SSH access with AWS Systems Manager Session Manager for EC2 instances, enhancing security and compliance.

item.title: Hardening EC2 Instances for AWS Security: A Practical Guide
item.description: Learn how to harden EC2 instances in AWS using step-by-step technical guidance. Covers IAM, OS hardening, monitoring, encryption, and AWS best practices.

item.title: I Built an AWS Incident Response Toolkit (and You Can Use It)
item.description: After publishing my free AWS IR checklist, I decided to go one step further — a full incident response toolkit with Terraform code, automation scripts, and ready-to-use templates. Here’s what’s inside.

item.title: Building Least-Privilege IAM Roles with IAM Access Analyzer
item.description: Learn how to use IAM Access Analyzer to identify risky permissions, generate fine-tuned IAM policies, and integrate the tool into your AWS development workflow.

item.title: How to Detect AWS Root Account Usage (And Respond to It)
item.description: This guide walks you through detecting and responding to AWS root account usage using CloudTrail, EventBridge, SNS, and optionally Lambda or Slack. Includes Terraform examples and AWS Console workflows.
